item.title: Content Security Policy (CSP)
item.description: # Skip to TLDR;? Introduction Content Security Policy (CSP) provides mechanisms for websites to restrict content that browsers will be allowed to load.

item.title: Finding History
item.description: CTF Flags Flag 1: CTF-j2XHEnfhLSBr6sfcxy4Fga1gUmyry65i Severity: Informational Description: CTF flag found in source code of homepage POC : Visit https://sumirbroota.

item.title: POC Format
item.description: Title: CTF flag found This is where you mention the name of the issue & if present mention CVE-ID for the same.
